K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:9a-10: sbyin pa de sbyin par byed pa de ni /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:9b-18: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par ji skad bstan pa de kho na bzhin du rgya cher sbyar bar bya'o //

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:10b-7: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bas khyab par byed do //

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:10b-9: de bzhin du phyogs mtshams kyi bar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag snang bas khyab par byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:10b-10: khyab par byas nas kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g-yo bar byed /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:11a-15: des sbyin pa de lta bu byin nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:11a-16: sems can de dag nyid la 'di lta ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:11a-17: pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos 'di dag nyid kyi chos ston to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:11a-18: sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:11a-19: nam yang log par ltung bar mi ltung la /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:11a-20: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du nam yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur te /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:11a-27: skye bo phal po che'i mdun du zas 'dod pa dag la zas sbyin pa nas /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:11b-4: sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob mas sems can gang la'ang sbyin pa byin pa yod snyam mam /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:11b-15: sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:11b-19: bsam bzhin du skye ba yongs su bzung bas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i rigs su skye ste /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:12a-2: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:27b-24: de de nas shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhig tu skyes so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:27b-25: de nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes so zhes de ltar rnam pa dang bcas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:27b-26: yul phyogs dang bcas par bdag dang /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:27b-29: mngon par shes pa des kyang rlom sems su mi byed pa'i bar du ste /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:28a-1: sems dpa' chen po'i sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa yongs su dag par byed pa nyid ces bya'o //

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:28a-12: ngo bo nyid kyis dben pa nyid kyi phyir dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:28a-13: ngo bo nyid kyis dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa zad pa shes pa mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa des kyang rlom sems su mi byed la /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:29b-13: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis rab tu mi shes pa nas /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:29b-19: kha dog ngan pa rnams dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:29b-24: gya nom pa dag kyang rab tu shes te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:30a-1: can 'di dag ni lus kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:30a-2: ngag gi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:30a-3: yid kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:30a-9: ngag gi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:30a-10: yid kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa dag ste zhes bya ba nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:30a-11: rgyu de dang rkyen de'i bar du ste /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:110a-2: ting nge 'dzin ji lta bu la snyoms par zhugs na bskal pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam du gnas par mi bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:110a-3: bdag gi tshe'i tshad ni dpag tu med par 'gyur ro snyam du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:110a-4: de bzhin du skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par 'gyur bar bya ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:110a-5: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan re re'ang bsod nams brgyas yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:110a-6: snyam du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:110a-10: byang phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma ji snyed pa de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu gyur cig snyam du gnas par mi bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:110a-11: bdag gi stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje las byas par gyur cig snyam du gnas par mi bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:110a-12: bdag gi byang chub kyi shing las sems can gang dag dri snom pa de dag gi 'dod chags dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:110a-16: rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dag mi bskyed par sems can de dag gis dri de mnams pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa kho nar gyur la /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:110a-17: de dag la lus kyi nad dam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:110b-0: rlung @110b nad dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba'i dri de lta bu dag 'byung bar gyur cig snyam du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:110b-1: bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der gzugs kyi sgra 'byung bar ma gyur cig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:110b-2: de bzhin du tshor ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:110b-5: rnam par shes pa'i sgra 'byung bar ma gyur cig snyam du de ltar yang gnas par mi bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:110b-6: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra 'byung bar gyur cig ces bya ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:110b-7: de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:110b-8: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar gyi sgra 'ba' zhig 'byung bar gyur cig ces bya ba de ltar yang gnas par mi bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:110b-9: de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi sgra 'byung bar gyur cig ces bya ba de ltar yang gnas par mi bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:110b-10: de bzhin du rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyi sgra 'byung bar gyur cig snyam du gnas par mi bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:110b-11: bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyi sgra 'byung bar ma gyur cig ces bya ba nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:110b-13: rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sgra 'byung bar ma gyur cig snyam du gnas par mi bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:110b-14: byang chub sems dpa'i sgra dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:110b-15: sangs rgyas kyi sgra 'ba' zhig 'byung bar gyur cig snyam du de ltar yang gnas par mi bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:110b-17: le'u bar mar ji snyed bstan pa kho na bzhin du 'dir yang de bzhin du rgya cher sbyar bar bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:111a-1: ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:111a-3: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas chos thams cad la gnas par mi bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:111a-4: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu'i sems sems kyis shes nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:111a-7: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:111a-8: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:111a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa ni ci la'ang mi gnas pa yin la /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:111b-6: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin pa de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:111b-10: de ltar chos rnams la gnas par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:111b-11: de nas 'khor de las lha'i bu kha cig 'di snyam du sems te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:111b-12: gnod sbyin rnams kyis gnod sbyin gyi tshig dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:111b-14: gnod sbyin gyis brjod pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:111b-16: gnod sbyin gyis brjod par bya ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni bdag cag gis shes par rung gi /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:145b-0: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bltas pa nas phyag bya ba'i bar du @145b byas nas /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:145b-10: rigs kyi bu mo de'i tshe 'di'i yon tan dang /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:145b-12: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na 'khod pa'i lha gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir dang /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:145b-16: sba ba'i phyir 'ong bar sems par 'gyur ro //

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:145b-20: sems can thams cad kyi gnas dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:145b-22: sems can rnams yongs su mi gtong ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:145b-23: sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:145b-24: bde bar bya bar gnas pa yin pa'i phyir ro //

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:145b-29: rigs kyi bu mos phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams 'dir mchis pa nas /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:146a-7: de skad ces gsol ba dang /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:146a-11: rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gang du bzhag pa'i phyogs der snang ba rgya chen po mthong na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:146a-12: nges par der lha dbang che bar grags pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:146a-14: rdzu 'phrul che ba dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la yang dag par blta ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:146a-19: bkur sti bya ba'i phyir lhags par shes par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:146a-22: rigs kyi bu mo de la mi ma yin pa'i dri rgya chen po mnam na; nges par nger lha mthu che ba /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:146a-23: rdzu 'phrul che ba dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la blta ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:146a-26: kun chub par bya ba dang /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:146a-32: rigs kyi bu mo de rtag tu kun tu spyod pa gtsang mar byas nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:146b-0: @146b shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la cho ga bzhin du mchod pa byed na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:146b-1: de'i kun tu spyod pa gtsang ma des lha mang po dag lhags nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:146b-2: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la yang dag par bltas shing bzung /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:146b-8: mchod pa byas pas yi rangs par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:146b-9: lha dbang chung bar grags pa gang dag phyogs de na 'khod pa de dag kyang lha mthu che ba /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:146b-10: rdzu 'phrul che ba de dag gi gzi brjid dang dpal dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:146b-11: bla mar gyur pa nyid mi bzod pas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:146b-12: phyogs de nas 'dong bar sems par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:146b-13: ji lta ji ltar lha dbang che bar grags pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:146b-15: mthu che ba 'ong bar bya bar sems pa de lta de ltar rigs kyi bu'am /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:146b-16: rigs kyi bu mo de'i mos pa rgya chen por 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:146b-17: de'i nyen kor du gtsang sbra mi byed pa'i bag spyad par mi bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:146b-19: rigs kyi bu mo des kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mchod pa'i don dus phyogs de bdug pa sna tshogs kyis bdug par bya /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:146b-20: me tog sna tshogs dgram par bya /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:146b-21: pog phor rnams nas bdug par bya /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:146b-22: dar gyi lda ldi gtsang ma bre bar bya /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:146b-23: bla re sna tshogs bzang po bre bar bya /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:146b-24: sa phyogs de rnam pa du mas legs par brgyan par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:146b-27: rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bkur sti byed cing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:147a-5: lus gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:147a-7: yang de 'di ltar 'du shes par 'gyur te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:147a-8: nyal ba na rmi lam sdig pa can dag mthong bar mi 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:147a-9: des rmi lam du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:147a-10: sku dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus gsal bar byas pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:147a-11: sku gser gyi mdog can dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:147a-12: mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston pa mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:147a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de las kyang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:147a-15: pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:147a-16: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:147a-17: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyi chos thos par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:147a-18: pha rol tu phyin pa de dag gi don rnam par dbye ba thos par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:147a-19: de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyi don rnam par dbye ba thos par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:147a-20: byang chub kyi shing yang mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:147a-21: byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi shing drung du 'gro ba mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:147a-22: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:147b-0: de @147b bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:147b-1: byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag mang po dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni 'di ltar yongs su thob par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:147b-2: sems can rnams ni 'di ltar yongs su smin par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:147b-3: sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni 'di ltar yongs su dag par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:147b-4: bdud 'khor dang bcas pa ni 'di ltar yongs su gdul bar bya'o zhes 'brel ba'i gtam rnam par gtan la dbab pa byed pa'ang shes shing mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:147b-5: shar phyogs nas sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag gi sgra thos par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:147b-6: de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:147b-9: phyogs mtshams kyi bar dag nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:147b-10: sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag gi sgra thos par 'gyur te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:147b-11: kye 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:147b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhes bya ba zhig byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag 'di snyed cig dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:147b-13: nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag 'di snyed cig gis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to zhes thos par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:147b-14: de bzhin du shar phyogs na sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:148a-0: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po che sna bdun las @148a *//

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:148a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag dang /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:148a-20: de'i lus yang ba nyid du shes par 'gyur /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:148a-21: de zas la brkam pa nyid du mi 'gyur /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:148a-22: chos gos la brkam pa nyid du ma yin /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:148a-24: yo byad la brkam pa nyid du mi 'gyur /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:148a-25: de zas kyi 'du shes chung ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:148a-27: de yo byad kyi 'du shes chung ba nyid du 'gyur te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:148a-29: dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa 'dod pa nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:148a-30: ting nge 'dzin las langs pa zas la brkam pa'i shas che ba ma yin pa de bzhin du zas kyi 'du shes chung bar 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:148b-0: gang la la zhig gis lus la mi ma yin @148b pa rnams gzi byin 'jug par byed na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:148b-1: de ni de bzhin du 'gyur te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:148b-2: des na de la shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:148b-3: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:148b-11: lto 'phye chen po dag lus la gzi byin nye bar bsgrub par 'gyur bas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:148b-12: ji srid 'tsho'i bar du ba dan gyi bar dag dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:148b-13: rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs dag gis bkur sti bya /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:148b-17: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:148b-18: phan yon gyi le'u zhes bya ste bcu bdun pa'o ////
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:148b-20: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:148b-22: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur ba de gang nas shi 'phos nas 'dir mchis pa lags /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:148b-26: de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:148b-27: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:148b-28: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:148b-29: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:149a-2: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid la don dang tshul las mos par 'gyur lags sam; de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:149a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:149a-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpag tu med grangs med tshad med pa dag la bsnyen bkur byas nas 'dir 'ong ba dag yin /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:149a-6: 'dir skyes shing byung ba dag yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:149a-8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag gzhal du med cing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:149a-9: grangs med tshad med pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:149a-10: des sems dang po bskyed phyin chad sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing 'ongs pa yin /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:149a-11: de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:149a-12: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:149a-13: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:149a-14: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:149a-15: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing 'ongs pa yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:149b-0: de ni phyin chad de bzhin gshegs pa @149b dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grangs med tshad med pa dag la bsnyen bkur byed cing 'dir 'ongs pa yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:149b-2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ngam thos na bdag gis ni ston pa mthong ngo zhes sems bskyed par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:149b-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la'ang don dang tshig las mtshan ma med pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:149b-6: dmigs su med pa'i tshul gyis rjes su rtogs par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:149b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:149b-9: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni nyan pa po dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:149b-10: lta ba po rnams kyi ston pa lags so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:149b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:149b-16: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni nyan pa po dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:149b-18: rab 'byor; chos bems po nyid kyi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi thos mi mthong ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:149b-19: de bzhin du chos bems po nyid kyi phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi thos mi mthong ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:149b-20: de bzhin du chos bems po nyid kyi phyir brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:149b-21: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:149b-22: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:150a-0: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi @150a *//

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:202a-15: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang bral ba yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:202a-17: bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshig bla dvags yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:202a-18: gzhal du med pa zhes bya ba de ni gzhal du med pa'i tshig bla dvags yin no //

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:202a-27: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:202b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:202b-7: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i le'u 'di bshad pa na dge slong lnga brgya ni /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:202b-8: len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:202b-9: dge slong ma nyis brgya ni /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:202b-10: len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam grol lo //

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:202b-14: byang chub sems dpa' nyis stong gis ni /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:202b-15: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:202b-16: de dag kyang bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la lung bstan to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:202b-17: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:202b-20: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:202b-22: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab pa lags shing /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:203a-11: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dir pha rol tu phyin pa lnga 'dus pa dang /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:203b-5: byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams sam /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:203b-16: de bzhin du gong ma bzhin du sbyar te /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:205a-0: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab cing mthong bar dka' la rtogs par dka' @205a *//

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:205a-2: zhi ba zhi ba mo brtags pa'i mkhas pa dang /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:205a-9: gang gi tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed mchis pa de dag thams cad dad pas rjes su 'brang bar gyur cing /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:205a-20: nye bar rtog par bgyid na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:205a-22: spong ba de nyid ches mang ba lags kyi /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:205a-24: rang sangs rgyas kyi bar de dag gi shes pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:205a-25: spong ba ni ma lags so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:205a-26: de ci'i slad du zhe na /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:205b-1: spong ba gang lags pa dang /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:206a-2: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i yang dag phul gyi chos de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:206a-3: de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:206a-14: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bslabs nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:206a-15: dad pas rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:206a-17: rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:206a-20: rang sangs rgyas rnams phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su nges par 'byung lags so //

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:206b-0: phung po'i lhag ma med @206b ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la ni bri ba'am /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:206b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas dong ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:206b-7: de dag ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu rdzu 'phrul gyis dong nas mi snang bar gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:206b-8: de la 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha de dag ni 'dod pa'i khams su 'khod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:206b-9: gzugs na spyod pa'i lha gang dag yin pa de dag ni gzugs kyi khams su 'khod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:206b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das la; tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:206b-12: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas; thos ma thag tu mos par 'gyur zhing gong du'ang yi ger 'dri ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:206b-15: kun chub par bgyid pa nas /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:306a-13: ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la'ang spyod la don de la spyod pa na'ang yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du ma byas pas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:306a-15: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par mi 'gyur ba de dag ni phyag bya bar 'os pa yin te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:306a-16: rnam grangs des na rigs kyi bu'am /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:306a-17: rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid 'di dag mngon sum du mi byed pa de dag ni phyag bya bar 'os pa yin no snyam mo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:306a-18: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha de dag la 'di skad ces smras so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:306b-0: gang dge ba'i chos mnyam pa nyid @306b gang mngon sum du byas pas nyan thos kyi sa'am /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:306b-1: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba'i chos mnyam pa nyid 'di dag mngon sum du mi byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi ngo mtshar gcig dka' ba byed pa ma yin gyi /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:306b-3: gang sems can 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med tshad med pa dag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o zhes go cha gyon par byed la /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:306b-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sems can thams cad gdul bar 'dod par sems te de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:306b-6: sems can thams cad gdul bar bya'o snyam nas go cha bgos pa de dag ni nam mkha' gdul bar 'dod par sems pa yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:306b-8: nam mkha' dben pa'i phyir sems can dben par blta bar bya ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:306b-9: de bzhin du nam mkha' stong pa nyid kyi phyir sems can stong pa nyid du blta bar bya ba dang /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:307a-2: gang zhig sems can rnams kyi ched du snying rje chen po'i go cha bgo bar sems pa de ni nam mkha' dang 'thab par 'dod du zad de /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:307a-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha bgos pa des ni gang dag gi don du go cha bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang mi dmigs so //

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:349b-18: de bzhin du gang dag stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis bsdu bar bya ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:349b-19: gang dag mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bsdu bar bya ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:349b-20: gang dag smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bsdu bar bya ba de dag ni /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:349b-21: smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su sdud do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:350a-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin @350a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:350a-2: rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:350a-3: de bzhin du mngon par shes pa lnga dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:350a-4: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:350a-5: sems can gang dag sbyin pas bsdu bar bya ba de dag ji ltar sbyin pas yongs su sdud ce na /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:350a-11: skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:350a-12: bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni bzhon pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:350a-13: gos 'dod pa rnams la ni gos /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:350a-14: me tog 'dod pa rnams la ni me tog /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:350a-15: phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la ni phreng ba /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:350a-16: spos 'dod pa rnams la ni spos /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:350a-17: byug pa 'dod pa rnams la ni byug pa /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:350a-19: stan 'dod pa rnams la ni stan /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:350a-20: mar me 'dod pa rnams la ni mar me /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:350a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ji ltar dbul ba de bzhin du nyan thos dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:350a-23: rang sangs rgyas rnams la'ang chos gos dang /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:350b-13: de bzhin du mi rnams la'ang sbyin pa sbyin //

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:350b-16: de snod dang snod ma yin par yongs su mi rtog gi /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:350b-18: sbyin pa sbyin par byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:350b-20: 'di ltar chos thams cad tha dad pa med par rtogs pa'i phyir yongs su shes shing mngon du byas nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:350b-21: de tha dad pa med pa'i sbyin pa byin pas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:350b-22: tha dad pa med pa'i chos /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:350b-26: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i srog chags mthong na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:350b-27: 'di snyam du bdag gi sbyin gnas ni /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:350b-28: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin gyi /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:350b-29: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa ni ma yin no snyam du sems bskyed na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:350b-30: byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma yin no //

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:351a-3: gzhan gyi rdzas dag la rku bar mi 'gyur zhing chog shes par gyur nas gzhan dag la'ang sbyin pa byed par 'gyur /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:351a-4: de bzhin du sbyin bas bsdus na srog chags rnams kyi srog gcod par mi 'gyur /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:351a-5: de bzhin du sbyin pas bsdus na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:351a-9: tshig 'khyal pa mi smra bar 'gyur te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:351a-10: de dag rgyu des lus zhig pa'i 'og tu /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:351a-11: rgyal rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu'i khyim dag tu skye bar 'gyur /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:351a-12: de bzhin du bram ze'i rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu'i khyim dag tu skye bar 'gyur /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:351a-13: khyim bdag gi rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu'i khyim dag tu skye bar 'gyur /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:351a-14: de dag rgyu de nyid kyis /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:351a-17: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:351a-18: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pas phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i myang na las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du 'gyur ro snyam nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:351a-19: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdag gis sems can mgon med pa rnams kyi mgon dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:351a-20: gnas med pa rnams kyi gnas dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:351b-0: yongs su 'dren pa med pa rnams @351b kyi yongs su 'dren par 'gyur bar bya'o zhes sngon yi dam 'di ma bcas sam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:351b-3: gzhan gang dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus bslangs na'ang des sbyin nam mi sbyin snyam du sems gzhan bskyed par mi bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:351b-4: 'khrug pa med pa'i sems kyis phyir rgol ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:351b-5: gsod pa de dag la rang gi lus sbyin par bya'o; ;de ci'i phyir zhe na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:351b-6: 'di ltar de ni sems can thams cad kyi don dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:351b-8: bde ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa yin gyi /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:351b-9: lus dang srog gi phyir ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro //

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:351b-11: de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:351b-12: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:351b-14: de las gzhan pa 'phags pa'i gang zag de dag dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:351b-15: lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten gyis kyang de la khyod la sus gsol ba btab na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:351b-16: bdag sems can thams cad kyi skyabs dang /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:351b-20: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:352a-10: gang 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams brjod pa dang /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:352a-19: mngon par shes pa lnga brjod pa dang; 'chad pa dang /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:352a-23: ci'i phyir 'jig rten pa yin zhe na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:352a-24: 'jig rten las mi 'phags pas; de'i phyir 'jig rten pa zhes bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:352a-25: de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa de byin nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:352a-26: rnam grangs du mas sems can de dag bsam gtan dang /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:352b-1: mngon par shes pa de dag las 'byed par byed /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:359b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil ni @359b 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa'o //

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:359b-6: bcom ldan 'das ni sor mo ring ba'o //

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:359b-8: de'i phyag dang zhabs rnams kyi sor mo dag lhag par ring ste /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:383b-5: sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:383b-6: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dang /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:384a-15: sems can dang sems can du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs mod kyi /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:408a-16: ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:410a-7: mthong ba po'i bar gyi gtam gyi sbyor ba la brtson par mi gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:410a-9: 'di ltar chos thams cad srog med pa dang /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:410a-14: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de; nam yang ser sna'i sbyor ba la brtson par mi gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:410a-15: de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:410a-16: 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi sbyor ba la brtson par mi gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:410a-17: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:410a-18: 'khrug pa dang khro ba'i sbyor ba la brtson par mi gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:410a-19: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:410a-20: le lo'i sbyor ba la brtson par mi gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:410a-21: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:410a-22: rnam par g-yeng ba'i sbyor ba la brtson par mi gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:410b-0: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la @410b spyod de /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:410b-1: 'chal ba'i shes rab kyi sbyor ba la brtson par mi gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:410b-2: de chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod cing chos 'dod pa yin te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:410b-3: sems can rnams kyi don kyang byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:410b-4: chos kyi dbyings la spyod cing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:410b-5: chos tha dad pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa ma yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:410b-6: de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:410b-7: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la bshes gnyen du 'dod pa yin te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:410b-8: bshes gnyen du 'dod pa des chos thos nas nyan thos dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:410b-9: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i sems can gang dag yin pa de dag la chos de ston cing mos par byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:410b-10: chos de bstan cing mos par byas nas sems can de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:410b-13: de de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la blta ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:410b-14: mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams gang na bzhugs shing gzhes pa der skyes te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:410b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mthong zhing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:410b-17: rdzogs pa'i byang chub yid la byed pa'i yid la byed pa de dag gis nyin mtshan du gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:411a-0: 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni phal cher 'dod pa'i khams @411a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:411a-1: dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag bskyed nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:411a-2: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la gnas te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:411a-3: gang na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mngon du gyur cing mthong ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu smon lam gyi dbang gis skye ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:411a-4: de bzhin du bsam gtan dang po bskyed cing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:411a-5: bsam gtan bzhi ba'i bar du bskyed nas smon lam gyi dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu skye'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:411a-9: mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par ston to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:411a-11: gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:411a-12: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:411a-13: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:411a-14: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la spyod /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:411a-16: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la spyod pa de 'di snyam du bdag ni phyir mi ldog pa'am /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:411a-17: phyir mi ldog pa ma yin no snyam du de the tshom rnam pa thams cad du mi skye'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:411a-19: de rang gi sa la the tshom med de /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:411a-20: chos rnams shin tu yongs su shes pa'i phyir ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:411a-22: 'di ltar de ni phyir mi ldog pa'am /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:411b-0: phyir mi ldog pa ma yin @411b pa'i chos phra rab tsam yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:411b-4: rgyun du zhugs pa'i gang zag ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu de la som nyi med cing the tshom mi za'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:411b-6: de bzhin du phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang phyir mi ldog pa'i sa de la som nyi med cing the tshom mi za'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:411b-7: de phyir mi ldog pa'i sa de la gnas nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:411b-8: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:411b-9: sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:411b-10: bdud kyi las skyes shing byung ba dag kyang shes te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:411b-11: bdud kyi las kyi dbang du'ang mi 'gro'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:411b-12: bdud kyi las thams cad shes nas kyang rnam par 'joms so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:411b-17: mtshams med pa byed pa'i mi ni 'chi kha'i bar du'ang rtag tu mtshams med pa'i sems dang mi 'bral zhing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:411b-18: de'i mtshams med pa'i sems de rjes su 'brang ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:411b-19: mtshams med pa'i sems de ni thabs thams cad kyis kyang gzhil bar mi nus shing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:411b-20: de'i kun nas ldang ba'i sems de ni 'chi kha'i bar du'ang rjes su 'brang ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:411b-22: de bzhin du phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phyir mi ldog pa'i sems de'ang phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par gyur nas mi g-yo ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:412a-0: lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i @412a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:412a-1: byang chub las phyir zlog par mi nus so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:412a-3: 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten las 'das nas yang dag pa nyid skyon med pa la zhugs te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:412a-4: rang gi sa la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa rnams kyis dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:412a-5: sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed de /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:412a-6: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:412a-8: dam pa'i chos kyang mnyan pa'i phyir /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:412a-9: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:412a-10: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed cing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:412a-11: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la yongs su 'dri bar byed /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:412a-13: bsnyen bkur byed pa'i phyir ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:412a-14: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las bstan pa'i bdud kyi las gang dag yin pa de dag kyang khong du chud de /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:412a-15: bdud kyi las skyes shing byung ba rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:412a-16: thabs la mkhas pas yang dag pa'i mtha' la sbyor bar byed cing de rang gi sa la nam yang nem nur med cing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:412b-0: the @412b tshom mi za la yid gnyis mi bskyed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:412b-3: 'di ltar de yang dag pa'i mtha' la nem nur dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:412b-4: yid gnyis dang the tshom mi za zhing yang dag pa'i mtha' la gcig gam gnyis su rnam par mi rtog ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:412b-5: de ltar shes pas de tshe brjes nas kyang nyan thos dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:412b-6: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar sems mi bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:412b-9: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la chos gang yang skye ba'am /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:412b-12: rnam par byang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:412b-14: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de srid pa las 'das nas kyang 'di snyam du bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur snyam mam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:412b-15: 'on te mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur snyam du mi sems so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:412b-18: 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:412b-20: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gi sa la de ltar gnas pa de ni gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa yin /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:412b-21: sems can thams cad kyis mi thub pa yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:413a-1: pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar gnas pa ni mi 'phrogs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i phyir te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:413a-3: gal te phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad kyis 'ongs nas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:413a-6: khyod tshe 'di nyid la nyon mongs pa thams cad zad pa'i dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyis shig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:413a-7: khyod ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:413a-8: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ba'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa'ang khyod kyis ma thob bo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:413a-11: mtshan ma gang dag dang ldan na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:413a-12: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ba'i rnam pa de dag dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:413a-14: mtshan ma de dag kyang khyod la med do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:413a-15: zhes zer yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sgra de thos nas mi zhum /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:413a-16: mi 'gong zhing de'i sems gzhan du mi 'gyur la /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:413b-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des bdag @413b ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to snyam du rig par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:413b-3: 'di ltar de 'di snyam du chos gang dag dang ldan na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag bdag la yod do snyam du sems pa'i phyir ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:413b-5: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i drung du bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad kyis 'ongs nas 'di skad ces /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:413b-7: rang sangs rgyas su gyis shig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:413b-8: khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis ci zhig bya zhes zer zhing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:413b-9: rnam grangs du mas nyan thos kyi sa'am /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:413b-10: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug kyang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:413b-11: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po der 'di snyam du 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'am /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:413b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos ma yin gyi /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:413b-13: kye ma 'di ni bdud dam bdud sdig can gyis sprul pa'i mi zhig bdag gi gan du 'ongs nas nyan thos kyi sa'am /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:413b-14: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'dzin du 'jug pa yin gyi /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:413b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:414a-1: sems dpa' chen po nyan thos kyi sa'am /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:414a-2: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mi mdzad do snyam du sems na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:414a-6: mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:414a-8: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde dag klog cing kha ton byed pa'i drung du bdud dam bdud sdig can gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i mi zhig 'ongs nas 'di skad ces /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:414a-10: gang la khyod spyod pa'i mdo sde de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa'i shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde ma yin /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:414a-11: nyan thos kyis bshad pa ma yin gyi /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:414a-13: gzhan mu stogs can gyis bshad pa yin /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:414a-14: de dag ni shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde ma yin no zhes zer na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:414a-15: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des kye ma gang bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang 'bral bar byed cing byang chub kyi lam las 'dun pa zlog par byed pa 'di ni /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:414a-16: bdud dam bdud sdig can gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i mi zhig yin no snyam du rig par byed na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:414b-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra @414b bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par rig par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:414b-1: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par rig par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:414b-4: 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnam pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:414b-6: mtshan ma gang dag yin pa'i rnam pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:414b-8: mtshan ma de dag de la yod cing snang ba'i phyir ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:414b-10: gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i ched du bdag gi srog kyang yongs su gtong bar byed la /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:414b-11: chos de ni yongs su mi gtong ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:414b-13: 'di ltar de 'di snyam du sems te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:414b-14: dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba byas na 'das pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:414b-16: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod par 'gyur /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:414b-17: de dag gi dam pa'i chos kyang yongs su gzung bar byas par 'gyur ro snyam pa'i phyir ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:414b-18: de la chos gang gi ched du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de srog kyang yongs su gtong bar byed la /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:414b-19: chos de ni yongs su mi gtong ba gang zhe na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:415a-0: 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams chos thams cad @415a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:415a-2: de la mi blun po kha cig ni 'di ni chos ma yin /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:415a-4: 'di ni ston pa'i bstan pa ma yin /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:415a-5: 'di ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gro ba'i lam ma yin no zhes phyir zlog par byed cing phyir rgol te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:415a-7: dam pa'i chos de'i ched du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gi srog kyang yongs su gtong bar byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:415a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag ma 'ongs pa na 'byung ba de dag gi nang du bdag kyang grangs su chud par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:415a-10: bdag kyang der lung bstan par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:415a-11: chos de'i ched du bdag gi srog kyang yongs su gtang bar bya'o snyam du sems so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:415a-13: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des don gyi dbang 'di mthong bas dam pa'i chos kyi ched du rang gi srog kyang yongs su gtong bar byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:415a-16: rtags dang; mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog pa yin par rig par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:415b-0: gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan pa'i chos de la som nyi med cing the tshom mi @415b za ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:415b-1: chos de la yid gnyis gcig tsam yang mi skyed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:415b-3: bzung nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du chud za bar mi byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:415b-5: 'di ltar gzungs rab tu thob pa'i phyir ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:415b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to; ;btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:415b-7: gzungs gang thob pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde rnams chab mi 'tshal bar bgyid lags /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:415b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:415b-10: mi zad pa'i za ma tog gi gzungs shin tu thob pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:415b-11: de bzhin du rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:415b-12: padma bkod pa'i gzungs shin tu thob pas phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde rnams thos nas chud za bar mi byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:415b-15: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde kho na thos nas som nyi ma mchis shing the tshom mi mtshal la /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:415b-16: gong du'ang 'dzin par bgyid cing tshul bzhin yid la bgyid pa'i bar du bgyid la /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:415b-17: chab mi 'tshal bar bgyid du bas kyi /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:416a-1: bshad pa rnams la ma lags sam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:416a-2: lhas bshad pa rnams la ma lags sam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:416a-3: klus bshad pa rnams la ma lags sam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:416a-4: gnod sbyin gyis bshad pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:416a-8: lto 'phye chen pos bshad pa'i mdo sde rnams thos nas kyang som nyi ma mchis shing the tshom mi 'tshal la /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:416a-9: gong du'ang 'dzin par bgyid lags sam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:416a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:416a-12: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can rnams kyi skad dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:416a-16: brjod pa thams cad la som nyi med cing the tshom mi za la yid gnyis med pa yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:416a-21: brjod pa rnams thos ma thag tu 'dzin cing chud za bar mi byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:416a-22: de dag gi don kyang de kho na nyid du shes te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:416a-23: gzungs 'di dag shin tu thob pa'i phyir ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:416a-27: mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog pa yin par rig par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:416a-28: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:416a-29: phyir mi ldog pa'i le'u zhes bya ste sum cu gcig pa'o ////
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:416a-30: de nas bcom ldan 'das la che dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:416b-1: gal te phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan gyi chos de lta bu dang ldan pa gang la gnas nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:416b-2: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i lam gyi rnam pa ni ji lta bu zhig lags /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:416b-3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ni gang lags /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:416b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:416b-6: pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam yin no /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:416b-7: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:416b-8: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:416b-9: stong pa nyid bcu bzhi dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:416b-10: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:416b-11: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:416b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang; mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:416b-13: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam yin te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:416b-15: de lta mod kyi chos thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:416b-18: gang la bslabs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par mi bya ba'i chos 'ga' zhig yod snyam mam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:417a-1: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par mi bya ba'i chos 'di ni 'ga' yang med do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:417a-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag chos thams cad la ma bslabs par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par nus pa med pa'i phyir ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:417a-4: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:417a-5: bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:417a-7: gal te chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa lags na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:417a-15: so so'i skye bo'i chos sam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:417a-16: rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos sam; lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i chos sam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:417a-19: rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:417a-20: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bgyi bar 'di nas sam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:417a-22: 'di zhes rig par bgyi ba gang la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams la tha dad du bgyid lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:417a-25: ji skad smras pa de bzhin te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:417a-26: chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:417b-0: gal te chos thams @417b cad stong pa ma yin du zin na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:417b-1: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ba zhig na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:417b-3: gang gi phyir chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o; ;rab 'byor /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:417b-4: gang yang 'di skad ces gal te chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:417b-8: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du 'di nas sam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:417b-10: 'di zhes rig par bya ba gang la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams la tha dad du byed ces zer ba ni /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:417b-12: gal te sems can de dag gis chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong par de ltar shes na ni /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:417b-13: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad la bslabs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi 'gyur ba zhig na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:417b-15: gang gi phyir sems can de dag gis chos thams cad stong par mi shes pa de'i phyir /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:418a-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad la bslabs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing @418a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:418a-1: sangs rgyas kyang chos rnam par bzhag pa byas nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:418a-2: sems can rnams la chos ston to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:418a-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i lam gang la slob pas thog ma nyid du 'di ltar brtag par bya ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:418a-5: mngon par zhen pa ma gtogs par 'di la chos gang ngo bo nyid kyis dmigs pa ni 'ga' yang med de /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:418a-6: 'dir bdag gis chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid la brtags nas chos gang yang ma dmigs na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:418a-7: ci'i phyir bdag chos rnams la mngon par zhen par bya snyam du brtag par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:418a-9: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi ngo bo nyid la rtog na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:418a-10: yang na pha rol tu phyin pa drug gam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:418a-11: yang na byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun nam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:418a-12: yang na rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:418a-13: yang na lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:418a-14: yang na phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:418a-15: yang na dgra bcom pa nyid dam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:418a-16: yang na rang byang chub bam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:418a-17: yang na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:418a-18: chos gang la'ang mngon par zhen pa med do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:418a-20: 'di ltar des chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong par mthong ste stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:418b-0: stong pa nyid kyang dmigs su med @418b na; stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:418b-2: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med par gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:418b-3: bslab pa gang la bslabs shing bslab pa gang la gnas nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:418b-4: sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa la rnam par lta bar byed de /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:418b-5: 'di dag gang la spyod ces bltas na yod pa ma yin pa la 'dzin pa la'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:418b-6: yod pa ma yin pa la 'dzin pa la spyod pa'i sems can de dag mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:418b-7: sems can 'di dag ni yod pa ma yin pa la 'dzin pa las dgrol sla ba dag go snyam nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:418b-8: thabs la mkhas pas sems can de dag yod pa ma yin pa la 'dzin pa de dang bral bar byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:418b-9: bral nas kyang chos drug la 'jug par byed de /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:418b-10: 'di skad ces kye sems can dag sbyin pa dag byin cig dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:418b-11: khyod longs spyod rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro; ;longs spyod de dag gis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:418b-12: de la snying po cung zad kyang med do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:418b-13: de bzhin du tshul khrims srungs shig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:418b-15: de bzhin du brtson 'grus rtsoms shig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:418b-16: de bzhin du bsam gtan rnams la snyoms par zhugs shig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:418b-17: de bzhin du shes rab sgoms shig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:418b-18: de dag gis rlom sems su'ang ma byed cig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:419a-1: snying po cung zad kyang med do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:419a-2: de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gnas par gyis shig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:419a-3: des rlom sems su'ang ma byed cig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:419a-4: de bzhin du dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar la gnas par gyis shig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:419a-5: des rlom sems su'ang ma byed cig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:419a-6: de bzhin du rang byang chub la gnas par gyis shig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:419a-7: de bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas par gyis shig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:419a-8: de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la gnas par gyis shig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:419a-9: de dag gis rlom sems su'ang ma byed cig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:419a-10: de dag la snying po cung zad kyang med do zhes ston te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:419a-11: de sems can de dag la de skad 'doms /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:419a-12: de skad rjes su ston cing de byang chub kyi lam la spyod de /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:419a-13: chos gang la'ang mngon par zhen par mi 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:419a-15: ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir gang gis de dag mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:419a-16: gang du de dag mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba de dag gi ngo bo nyid med de /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:419a-17: chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:419a-18: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam la spyod cing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:419a-19: chos gang la'ang mi gnas pa ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:419a-20: de'ang gnas pa med pa'i tshul gyis gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:419a-21: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:419b-0: @419b de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:419b-1: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:419b-2: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:419b-3: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:419b-4: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:419b-6: de bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:419b-9: 'di ltar bsam gtan ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong la gang snyoms par 'jug pa de'ang stong zhing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:419b-10: rnam pa gang dag yin pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang stong pa'i phyir ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:419b-11: de bzhin du bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar la'ang sbyar bar bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:419b-12: de bzhin du byams pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:419b-15: btang snyoms la'ang snyoms par 'jug ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:419b-16: de dag la'ang mi gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:419b-17: de bzhin du gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:419b-18: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:419b-19: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la'ang snyoms par 'jug ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:419b-20: de dag la'ang mi gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:419b-21: de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang 'thob ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:419b-23: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du'ang 'thob ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:419b-25: de bzhin du rang byang chub kyang 'thob ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:419b-28: rnam pa gnyis kyi phyir te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:419b-29: 'bras bu de dag ngo bo nyid kyis med pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:420a-0: de gang la gnas pa de tsam gyi chog par 'dzin @420a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:420a-3: bdag gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob par mi bya /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:420a-4: bdag gis de la gnas par mi bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:420a-5: de bzhin du rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i bar la gnas par mi bya'o snyam mo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:420a-7: 'di ltar de 'di snyam du sems te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:420a-8: bdag ni the tshom med par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:420a-9: chos de dag kyang 'di nyid la yod do snyam du sems pa'i phyir ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:420a-10: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems dang po bskyed phyin chad /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:420a-11: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems ma gtogs par nam yang sems gang yang rung ba ma bskyed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:420a-12: sa dang po nas bzung ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:420a-13: sa bcu pa'i bar du'ang de bzhin te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:420a-14: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems 'ba' zhig go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:420a-16: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par mi g-yeng ba'i yid kyis lus sam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:420a-18: yid kyis rnam par gang dang gang gnon pa ni thams cad du'ang byang chub kyi sems dang lhan cig pa ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:420a-19: byang chub kyi sems de nyid la gnas nas byang chub kyi lam la rnam par g-yeng ba mi skyed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:420a-21: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:420b-0: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das @420b gal te chos thams cad ma skyes pa lags na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:420b-2: ci lam skyes pas byang chub 'thob lags sam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:420b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:420b-7: ci lam ma skyes pas byang chub 'thob lags sam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:420b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:420b-12: 'o na ci lam skyes pa'ang ma lags /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:420b-13: ma skyes pa'ang ma lags pas byang chub 'thob lags sam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:420b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:420b-19: 'o na gang gis byang chub 'thob lags /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:420b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:420b-22: byang chub ni lam gyis kyang mi 'thob la /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:420b-23: lam ma yin pas kyang mi 'thob bo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:420b-26: byang chub nyid lam yin la /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:420b-27: lam nyid byang chub yin pa'i phyir ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:420b-30: gal te byang chub nyid lam lags la /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:420b-31: lam nyid byang chub lags na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:420b-32: de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub de thob pa nyid lags na /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:425a-10: de bdag kyang dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:425a-11: gzhan dag kyang dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:425a-17: de 'dra ba kho na'i rgyu'i spyod pa la 'jug cing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:425a-20: bsod nams kyi stobs yongs su bzung bas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:425a-21: mthar gyis de 'dra ba'i lus gzugs bzang ba mngon par 'grub bo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:425b-0: des sems @425b can gang dag yongs su smin par byas pa de dag thams cad kyang de nyid dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:425b-3: smon pa med ba'i sgra 'byung ba yang na nang gi sgra mid pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:425b-7: rkan la sogs pa'i 'bad pas bskyed pa rnams sam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:425b-8: yang na phyi rol gyi sgra rlung gis bskyod pa stong pa nyid dang; mtshan ma med pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:425b-9: smon pa med pa'i sgra 'byung ba ji ltar chos de dag ngo bo nyid kyis skye ba med pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:425b-10: chos thams cad ni chos thams cad kyis stong ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:425b-11: gang gi phyir stong pa de'i phyir de dag la mtshan ma med do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:425b-12: gang la mtshan ma med pa de la smon pa med de /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:425b-17: nyin mtshan du chos bstan pa 'di lta bu 'byung ba ma gtogs par de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yongs su dag par ma gyur pa gang na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:425b-18: ngan song gsum gdags pa yod pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:425b-19: lta bar gyur pa rnams sam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:425b-28: bdag med pa rnams gdags pa yod pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:425b-29: de bzhin du ngar 'dzin pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:425b-33: kun nas dkris pa rnams dang /
