K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:426a-1: der byang chub sems dpa' de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:426a-2: byang chub sems dpa' de byang chub thob nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:426a-3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa de dag thams cad de'i bsngags pa brjod par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:426a-4: sems can gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i ming thos pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rang gis sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:426a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i chos ston pa na chos 'di ni chos ma yin no zhes sems can gang yang chos de la the tshom za bar mi 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:426a-8: 'di ltar chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de la ni chos gang yang med par sems can de dag gis de bzhin du shes pa'i phyir te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:426a-10: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:426a-12: gzhan yang sems can gang dag mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang ldan zhing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:426a-14: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:426a-15: nyan thos rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:426a-16: sdig pa'i grogs pos zin pa dag dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:426b-0: gang dag dam pa'i chos thos na lta ba'i rnam pa gang dag gis zhus @426b par 'gyur ba /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:426b-6: chad pa gnyis kyi bar la gnas te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:426b-7: yod [?] do zhes bdag gis kyang log par 'dzin pa bzung la /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:426b-8: gzhan dag kyang log par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:426b-9: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin pa dag la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'du shes shing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:426b-10: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin par 'du shes pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:426b-11: chos ma yin pa la chos su smra zhing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:426b-12: dam pa'i chos yongs su spong ba de dag dam pa'i chos yongs su spangs nas lus zhig ste shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:426b-13: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can de dag la phan gdags pa'i phyir sems can dmyal ba der song nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:426b-14: sems can de dag sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang phral nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:426b-15: de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas shi 'phos te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:426b-16: der skyes pa rnams ni yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i tshogs la 'god par byed de /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:426b-17: ci nas kyang yang ngan song rnams su mi ltung zhing de nyid dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir skye bar 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su 'god par byed do /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:427a-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' @427a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:427a-1: chen po ni ci nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa der sems can de dag der skyes nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:427a-5: zag pa dang bcas pa rnams sam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:427a-6: zag pa med pa rnams sam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:427a-9: chos gang la'ang yid gnyis za bar mi 'gyur pa nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:427a-10: sems can de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba'i bar du de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:427a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:427a-13: ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag pa nyid kyi tshogs la nges pa lags sam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:427a-14: 'on te nyan thos kyi tshogs la nges pa lags sam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:427a-15: 'on te rang sangs rgyas kyi tshogs la nges pa lags sam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:427a-17: tshogs gang la nges pa lags /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:427a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:427a-20: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyan thos kyi tshogs la nges pa ma yin /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:427a-21: rang sangs rgyas kyi tshogs la nges pa ma yin gyi /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:427a-23: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshogs la nges pa yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:427b-1: ci dang po sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nges pa zhes bgyi'am /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:427b-2: 'on te srid pa tha ma pa lags /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:427b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:427b-5: dang po sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang nges pa yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:427b-7: srid pa tha ma pa'ang nges pa yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:427b-10: ci yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur lags sam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:427b-11: de skad ces gsol pa dang; bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:427b-19: rang byang chub ngan song rnams su skye bar 'gyur snyam mam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:427b-22: de ni ma lags so; ;bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:427b-24: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang dang po sems bskyed phyin chad sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod; de bzhin du tshul khrims srung /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:427b-26: dge ba'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus rtsom /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:427b-27: bsam gtan rnams la snyoms par 'jug /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:428a-1: chos thams cad spangs nas gnas pa de /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:428a-3: lha tshe ring po'i nang du skye ba'i gnas med do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:428a-4: gang na dge ba'i chos rnams mi spyod pa mtha' 'kho ba pa rnams kyi nang du'am /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:428a-5: kla klo'i mi rnams kyi nang du skye ba'am /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:428a-6: log par lta ba'i khyim rnams sam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:428a-7: mtha' 'khob pa'i mi rnams kyi nang du skye ba'am /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:428a-13: dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor gang du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba der skye bar 'gyur ba de ni gnas med do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:428a-14: gang na sangs rgyas kyi sgra'am /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:428a-16: dge 'dun gyi sgra mi grags pa'am /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:428a-18: lta ba'i sgra grags par 'gyur ba der skye bar 'gyur ba de ni /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:428a-21: dang po sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs nas mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs te 'dug pa de ni gnas med do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:428a-22: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:428a-23: bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:428a-25: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba du ma dang ldan pa lags na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:428b-0: ci'i slad du dud @428b 'gro'i skye gnas su skye zhing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:428b-1: de bzhin gshegs pas nyid kyi skyes pa'i rabs ston /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:428b-2: de dag 'khor bzhi po dag gi mdun du bstan pa mdzad /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:428b-3: dge ba'i rtsa ba de lta bu de dag ni slad rol [?] tu gyur pa lags so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:428b-4: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:428b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:428b-7: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mi dge ba'i las kyis dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skye ba'i lus yongs su 'dzin pa ma yin gyi /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:428b-8: lus gang gis don byed nus pa'i lus de sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir yongs su 'dzin to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:428b-10: byang chub sems dpa' dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa thabs la mkhas pa gang dang ldan pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:428b-11: gsad pa gang dag yin pa'i gan du 'gro zhing; de dag dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:428b-12: bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byed pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:428b-13: gsad pa de dag la rnam par 'tshe bar yang mi byed pa'i thabs la mkhas pa de dgra bcom pa rnams dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:428b-14: rang sangs rgyas rnams la cig yod dam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:428b-16: rnam grangs des na 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen pos yongs su zin pa ni snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed cing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:429a-0: sems can gyi don gyi phyir dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skye'ang dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa'i skyon @429a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:429a-1: rnams kyis kyang mi gos pa de ltar rig par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:429a-2: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:429a-3: bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:429a-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i chos gang dag la gnas nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:429a-6: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i lus rnams yongs su 'dzin lags /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:429a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:429a-9: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos gang dag yongs su rdzogs par bya ba de dag gang zhe na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:429a-11: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin pas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:429a-13: byang chub sems dpa' sems chen pos dang po sems bskyed pa kho na nas bzung ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:429a-14: byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du dge ba'i chos gang yongs su rdzogs par mi bya ba gang yang med de /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:429a-15: gang ma rdzogs par de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de ni gnas med do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:429a-17: de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dang po sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la bslab par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:429b-0: de de la @429b bslabs na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:429b-1: nyon mongs pa dang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad kyang spong bar 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:429b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:429b-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dkar po'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:429b-5: 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi bar dang ldan pa ji ltar ngan song rnams su skye lags /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:429b-6: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:429b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:429b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:429b-11: zag pa med pa yin nam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:429b-15: btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:429b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'phags pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:429b-18: zag pa mi mnga' ba lags so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:429b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:429b-22: de bzhin gshegs pas dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i srog chags kyi lus shig mngon par sprul te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:429b-23: mngon par sprul nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed dam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:429b-27: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:430a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa yin snyam mam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:430a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:430a-8: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i lam zag pa med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'ang sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir lus gang gis 'gro ba lnga po dag tu ci rigs par sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa de lta bu'i lus bsam bzhin du yongs su 'dzin to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:430a-12: dgra bcom pas dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa zhig mngon par sprul te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:430a-13: mngon par sprul nas dgra bcom pa'i las rnams byed du bcug na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:430a-14: las de dag gis 'khor bzhi po dag dga' ba bskyed dam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:430a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:430a-20: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa zag pa med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'ang lus gang gis sems can rnams kyi don spyod pa byed pa'i lus de lta bu yongs su 'dzin te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:430a-21: lus yongs su bzung ba des sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar yang mi 'gyur la /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:430a-22: de dang mthun pa'i skyon gyis kyang mi gos so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:430b-3: sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis skye bo phal po che'i mdun du glang po che'i gzugs ston tam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:430b-6: srog chags kyi rnam pa gzhan dag kyang ston na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:430b-9: sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma ngas bstan pa de glang po cher 'gyur ba'am /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:430b-12: srog chags kyi rnam pa gzhan dag tu 'gyur snyam mam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:430b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:430b-18: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa zag pa med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'ang lus ji lta bus sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'i lus de lta bu bsam bzhin du ston kyang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:430b-19: de dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas kyang mi gos so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:430b-21: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:430b-23: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa ye shes dang ldan pa 'di ltar lus gang dang gang gis sems can rnams kyi don bgyid rngo thogs pa'i lus de dang de yongs su 'dzin pa ni thabs la mkhas pa chen po lags na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:430b-25: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gang dag la gnas nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:431a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:431a-4: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:431a-5: thabs la mkhas pa 'di lta bu 'di byed de /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:431a-6: thabs la mkhas pa des phyogs bcu dag tu 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:431a-7: sems can de dag gi don byed kyang de dag la 'dod pa mi bskyed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:431a-9: 'di ltar des gang 'dod par byed pa'am /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:431a-10: gang la 'dod par byed pa'i chos de dag thams cad mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:431a-13: 'di ltar chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:431a-14: stong pa nyid ni 'dod par mi byed cing stong pa nyid la 'dod par byed pa su'ang med pa'i phyir ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:431a-16: 'di ltar de stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:431a-18: 'di ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yin te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:431a-19: de la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:431a-20: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:431a-21: sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g-yos te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:431a-24: kun tu rab tu g-yos so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:431a-27: kun tu rab tu ldeg go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:431b-8: steng gi bar snang la'ang lha bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas lha'i sil snyan bsgrags so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:431b-9: lha bye ba dag gis kyang lha'i me tog autpal dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:431b-11: padma dkar po'i me tog gi char chen po phab bo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:431b-13: long ba rnams kyis mig rnyed pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:431b-14: 'on pa rnams kyis thos pa rnyed pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:431b-15: smyon pa rnams kyis dran pa rnyed pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:431b-16: sems rnam par g-yengs pa rnams kyis mnyam par bzhag pa rnyed pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:431b-17: sil snyan bye ba phrag 'bum yang ma dkrol bar sgra byung bar 'gyur te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:431b-18: rmad du byung ba'i chos du ma 'jig rten du byung bar gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:431b-19: lha dang mi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab snyed dag gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:431b-20: sems can dzambu gling gi rdul phra rab snyed dag ni /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:431b-22: chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:431b-23: chos mngon par rtogs par gyur to //

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:437a-25: chos de la dad pa mi 'thob pa dang /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:437b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:437b-12: ji skad smras pa de bzhin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:437b-13: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:437b-14: bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:437b-17: rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos la /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:437b-18: thos nas kyang dad pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:437b-22: kun chub par bgyid pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:437b-23: tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:437b-25: yi ger 'drir stsol ba'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam zhig bskyed par 'gyur lags /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:437b-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:438a-0: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig @438a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:438a-1: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:438a-5: tshul bzhin du yid la byed /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:438a-6: yi ger 'dri zhing yi ger 'drir 'jug par byed la /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:438a-7: gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pas chos 'phrul gsum la bzhugs te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:438a-8: sems can rnams la chos bstan pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:438a-11: dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:438a-12: lung du bstan pa'i sde dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:438a-13: tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:438a-14: ched du brjod pa'i sde dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:438a-16: de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:438a-17: skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:438a-18: rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:438a-19: gtan la phab pa bstan pa'i sde de dag thams cad 'dzin /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:438a-23: tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:438a-24: tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i bar du byed pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po snga ma de'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:438a-28: bye ba stong gi cha dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:438a-35: gzhan yang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:438b-0: de bzhin @438b du lho phyogs dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:438b-3: de bzhin du phyogs mtshams bzhi dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:438b-5: steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag go de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams cho 'phrul gsum po dag la bzhugs nas sems can rnams la 'di lta ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:438b-7: dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:438b-8: lung du bstan pa'i sde dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:438b-9: tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:438b-10: ched du brjod pa'i sde dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:438b-12: de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:438b-13: skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:438b-14: rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:438b-15: gtan la phab pa bstan pa'i sde rnams kyi chos ston la /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:438b-17: rigs kyi bu mo gzhan yang gang la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di blangs shing bzung la /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:438b-18: kun chub par byas shing bklags la /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:438b-19: gzhan dag la'ang chos ston te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:438b-20: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid rgya cher yang dag par ston na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:438b-21: de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:438b-22: bsod nams kyi phung po mtshungs par skyed par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:438b-24: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'di las byung ba yin /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:439a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi cho @439a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:439a-1: 'phrul gsum po dag kyang 'di las byung ba yin /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:439a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mdo'i sde dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:439a-3: dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:439a-4: lung du bstan pa'i sde nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:439a-5: rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:439a-6: gtan la phab par bstan pa'i sde'i bar yang 'di las byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:439a-8: gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:439a-10: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis me tog nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:439a-11: ba dan gyi bar dag dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:439a-12: rol mo'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bsti stang du byas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:439a-16: gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger bris sam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:439a-18: glegs bam du byas pa la me tog nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:439a-19: ba dan gyi bar dag dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:439a-20: rol mo'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bsti stang du byas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:439a-23: mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams de ni mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:439b-0: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag @439b kyang 'di las nges par byung ba'i phyir ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:439b-3: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di len cing 'dzin la; kun chub par byed cing klog pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:439b-4: tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:439b-5: gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa de ni sems can dmyal bar mi 'gro bar shes par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:439b-6: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su mi 'gro ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:439b-7: gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mi 'gro bar shes par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:439b-8: nyan thos kyi sar ltung ba'i 'jigs pa med par shes par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:439b-9: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba'i 'jigs pa med par shes par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:439b-13: rigs kyi bu mo de phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par rig par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:439b-15: kun dga' bo 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sdig pa thams cad sel ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:439b-16: nad thams cad 'jig par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:439b-19: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger bris nas 'dzin pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:439b-21: kun chub par byed pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:439b-23: tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:440a-4: rol mo'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bsti stang du byed /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:440a-7: mchod pa byed pa de ni 'jigs pa ga las kyang mi 'byung bar shes par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:440a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa dag kyang 'di las nges par byung ba yin /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:440a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:440a-12: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:440a-15: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco bgyad kyang 'di las byung ba yin la /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:440a-16: kun dga' bo 'di las byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa lnga'ang pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming thob pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:440a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'di las nges par byung ba'i phyir ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:440a-24: rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:440a-26: kun chub par byed pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:440b-0: tshul bzhin du yid @440b la byed pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:440b-1: 'di nyid yi ger bris te glegs bam du byas pa la bsti stang du byed /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:440b-3: ri mor byed pa'i grong dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:440b-7: rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor der mi'am /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:440b-8: mi ma yin pa glags 'tshol ba rnams kyis glags mi rnyed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:440b-9: sems can de dag thams cad kyang theg pa gsum po dag la theg pa gang yang rung bas rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:440b-11: de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:440b-12: 'di ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas nye bar gnas pas na don che ba yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:440b-14: gang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der sangs rgyas byung bar shes par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:440b-17: nor bu rin po che rin thang med pa zhig yod la /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:440b-18: nor bu rin po che de'ang yon tan 'di dag dang ldan te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:440b-19: gang du las bya ba der nor bu rin po che de bzhag par gyur pa der mi glags lta bas glags mi rnyed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:440b-21: bud med mi ma yin pas zin par gyur pa der nor bu rin po che de bzhag na; mi ma yin pa de nor bu rin po che de'i gzi brjid mi bzod pas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:440b-22: de nas bdag nyid myur du 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:441a-0: de bzhin du mkhris pas tshig pa'i nad pa'i lus la nor bu rin po @441a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:441a-2: mkhris pa de rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:441a-4: bud med rlung gis phog pa'am /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:441a-6: 'dus pa'i nad kyis thebs pa'i skyes ba'am /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:441a-7: bud med de'i lus la nor bu rin po che de bzhag na reg ma thag tu nor bu rin po che de'i gzi brjid kyis nad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:441a-8: yang nor bu rin po che de ni mtshan mo snang bar byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:441a-9: tsha ba'i dus na nor bu rin po che de phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i phyogs der bsil bar byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:441a-10: grang ba'i dus na sa phyogs gang du nor bu rin po che de bzhag pa'i phyogs der dro bar byed de //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:441a-11: sa phyogs gang na sbrul gdug pa'am /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:441a-14: bud med gang la la zhig sbrul gdug pas zin par gyur na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:441a-15: de la la la zhig gis nor bu rin po che de bstan na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:441a-16: de mthong ma thag tu dug de med par 'gyur te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:441a-18: nor bu rin po che de ni yon tan de dag dang ldan no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:441a-21: bud med gang gi lus la 'bras dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:441a-29: bud med de'i lus la nor bu rin po che de bzhag na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:441a-30: de mthong ma thag tu nad de dag thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:441a-31: rdzing gi chu gang du nor bu rin po che de bcug na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:441b-0: chu de thams cad yan @441b lag brgyad dang ldan pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:441b-9: chur bcug na chu de thams cad kha dog sngon por 'gyur ba nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:441b-10: kha dog ser skya'i bar du kha dog gcig tu 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:441b-12: chu gang rnyog pa can du gyur pa der nor bu rin po che de bcug na dang bar 'gyur te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:441b-13: nor bu rin po che de yon tan de dag dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:441b-14: gzhan dag dang yang ldan pa yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:441b-16: de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nor bu rin po che dang 'dra ba 'di'ang yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur cing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:441b-17: sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa yin no ////
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:441b-18: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:441b-19: bam po sum cu bzhi pa ste tha ma /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:441b-20: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:441b-22: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:441b-24: nor bu rin po che de lha rnams la mchis sam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:441b-26: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:441b-27: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:441b-29: nor bu rin po che de ni lha rnams la'ang yod /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:441b-30: nor bu rin po che de ni dzambu gling gi mi rnams la'ang yod de /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:441b-31: dzambu gling gi mi rnams la yod pa'i nor bu rin po che de ni yon tan chung ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:442a-1: ni yon tan tshad med do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:442a-2: lha yul pa'i nor bu rin po che de za ma tog gang gi nang na bcug pa'i za ma tog de'ang de'i yon tan can du 'gyur te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:442a-3: gang la la zhig gis za ma tog de la reg na de'ang yon tan de dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:442a-5: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang lha yul pa'i nor bu rin po che dang 'dra ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:442a-6: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger bris te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:442a-7: gang du bzhag pa der gnod pa ci'ang mi 'byung bar shes par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:442a-8: nor bu rin po che de ni yon tan rnams ji lta bar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:442a-9: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:442a-10: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:442a-11: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar gyi yon tan yang de dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:442a-13: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yang de dang 'dra'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:442a-14: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:442a-19: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi yon tan rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:442a-20: de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba thams cad mkhyen pa zhes brjod de /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:442b-0: lha dang mi dang @442b lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten na bsti stang du bya /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:442b-5: pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag gi snod yin pa'i phyir ro //

K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:453b-1: de ni bsod nams mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:453b-4: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na dang po sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams nas sa bcu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji snyed pa dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las nges par 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:453b-5: de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag la'ang sbyar bar bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:453b-8: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis dzambu gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:453b-12: rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du bskyed snyam mam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:453b-16: btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:453b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:453b-21: rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don bzang po /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:453b-22: tshig 'bru bzang po 'di gzhan dag la rgya cher brjod pa nas yang dag par ston pa'i bar du byed la /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:453b-24: rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zung zhig ces bya ba nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:454a-1: skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la nan tan gyis shig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:454a-3: khyod gang gi tshe ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la slob pa de'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur zhing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:454a-4: de'i tshe bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes brjod na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:454a-5: de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du bskyed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:454a-8: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i sa de dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:454a-9: de bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba'i phyir ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:454a-10: de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag la'ang sbyar bar bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:454a-13: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis dzambu gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dzin du bcug ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:454a-14: de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don bzang po /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:454a-15: tshig 'bru bzang po 'di nyid brjod pa nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:454a-16: yang dag par ston pa'i bar du byed la /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:454a-17: 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod tshur shog /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:454b-0: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zungs shig ces bya ba nas ji @454b skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la nan tan gyis shig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:454b-1: gang gi tshe khyod kyis ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan byas pa de'i tshe /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:454b-2: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:454b-3: gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs pa de'i tshe bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes brjod pa bas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:454b-4: gang zhig phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de nyid la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:454b-5: yang dag par rab tu ston pa'i bar du byed la /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:454b-7: rigs kyi bu khyod tshur shog /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:454b-8: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zungs shig ces bya ba nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:454b-9: ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan gyis shig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:454b-10: nan tan byas na khyod rim gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes kyang brjod na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:454b-11: de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du bskyed par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:454b-12: de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag la'ang rgya cher sbyar bar bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:454b-14: gzhan yang dzambu gling gi sems can ji snyed pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:454b-15: gling bzhi pa'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur la /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:455a-2: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don bzang po /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:455a-3: tshig 'bru bzang po 'di ston pa bas ni /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:455a-4: gzhan gang zhig 'di skad ces bdag myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya zhing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:455a-5: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang ngan song gsum po dag tu lhung ba'i sems can rnams gdon par bya'o zhes zer ba de la rigs kyi bu'am /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:455a-6: rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don bzang po /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:455a-9: rigs kyi bu mo de ches bsod nams mang du bskyed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:455a-11: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la ni mtshar cig chos bstan mi dgos te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:455a-12: de dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzhol zhing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:455a-13: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang phyir mi ldog pa dag yin la /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:455a-14: 'di ni 'khor ba la yid 'byung zhing snying rje chen po 'jug pas yongs su gzir ba'i phyir ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:455a-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:455b-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji lta ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar gyur pa de lta de @455b ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan 'tshal lags te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:455b-1: de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:455b-2: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:455b-3: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:455b-4: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tuphyin pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:455b-5: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan 'tshal lags so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:455b-6: de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid nas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la gdams shing rjes su bstan 'tshal lags so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:455b-7: de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:455b-8: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar la gdams shing rjes su bstan 'tshal lags so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:455b-9: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:455b-11: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:455b-14: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gdams shing rjes su bstan 'tshal lags so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:455b-15: de lta de ltar zas dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:455b-20: yo byad rnams kyis sman gdags 'tshal lags te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:455b-21: byang chub sems dpa' de la chos kyis bsdu ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:455b-22: zang zing gis bsdu bas sman 'dogs pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:455b-23: rigs kyi bu mo de ni bsod nams ches mang du bskyed kyi /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:455b-25: rigs kyi bu mo snga ma de dag ni de lta ma lags so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:456a-0: @456a *// de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:456a-2: bdag ni 'di snyam du gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 'doms shing rjes su ston pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:456a-3: de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la 'doms shing rjes su ston pa de ni bsod nams ches mang du bskyed snyam bgyid pa'i slad du'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:456a-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:456a-6: khyod byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:456a-7: rigs kyi bu mo rnams la spro ba bskyed pa ni legs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:456a-9: 'phags pa nyan thos gang sems can rnams la phan gdags par 'dod pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la spro ba bskyed par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:456a-11: zang zing gis bsdu bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phan gdags par bya zhing yongs su bskyang bar bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:456a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:456a-15: byang chub sems dpa' rnams las byung la /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:456a-16: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'ang de las byung zhing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:456a-17: theg pa chen po'ang de las byung ba'i phyir ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:456b-0: gal te byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla @456b na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par ma gyur la /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:456b-1: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la ma bslabs te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:456b-2: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la ma bslabs na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:456b-3: pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:456b-4: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la ma bslabs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:456b-5: de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:456b-6: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:456b-7: rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:456b-8: nyan thos kyi byang chub yod par mi 'gyur ba zhig na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:456b-10: gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:456b-11: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la slob pa de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:456b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:456b-14: bdag gis ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:457a-0: @457a *// ji srid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'jig rten na spyod pa de srid du 'jig rten na sangs rgyas dkon mchog nub par mi 'gyur /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:457a-1: de bzhin du 'jig rten na chos dkon mchog dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:457a-2: dge 'dun dkon mchog nub par mi 'gyur /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:457a-3: de bzhin du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:457a-5: de bzhin du tshad med pa bzhi dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:457a-6: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:457a-7: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:457a-8: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:457a-9: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:457a-10: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:457a-11: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:457a-12: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:457a-13: de bzhin du thams cad shes pa nyid dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:457a-14: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:457a-15: de bzhin du rgyal rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:457a-16: bram ze'i rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:457a-17: khyim bdag gi rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:457a-18: de bzhin du rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:457b-0: de bzhin du 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams @457b 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:457b-1: de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:457b-2: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:457b-6: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:457b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:457b-8: rjes su sangs rgyas pa'i ye shes rnams 'jig rten na mchis par 'gyur /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:457b-9: sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:457b-10: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi ba'i bar du 'jig rten na mchis par 'gyur; mi dge ba'i chos thams cad ni yongs su nyams par 'gyur /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:457b-11: dge ba'i chos bsgom pa thams cad ni yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:457b-12: lha'i ris rnams ni mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur; lha ma yin gyi ris rnams ni yongs su nyams par 'gyur /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:457b-13: sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:457b-15: dge 'dun gyi tshul rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur; 'jig rten na chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar du mchis par 'gyur lags so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:457b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:458a-0: legs par smras so; ;shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yun ring po ji srid du 'jig rten na spyod par 'gyur ba yun ring po de srid du 'jig rten na sangs rgyas dkon mchog nub par mi 'gyur @458a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:458a-2: 'jig rten na chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar du yod par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:458a-5: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tha na thos pa tsam yang don chen po yin na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:458a-6: gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:458a-9: kun chub par byed pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:458a-10: tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:458a-22: rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs kyis bsti stang du byed pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:458a-25: mchod pa byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:458a-27: kun dga' bo; rigs kyi bu'am /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:458a-30: lha'i bu mo gang la la'i rna lam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di grag pa de dag thams cad ni dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:458b-0: 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gang dag byung ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid @458b la bslabs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur cing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:458b-1: phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das la /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:458b-2: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:458b-3: phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:458b-4: da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:458b-5: phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir ro /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:459a-0: 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol @459a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:459a-1: tu phyin pa'i nang du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad 'dus shing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:459a-2: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:459a-3: rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:459a-4: nyan thos kyi chos rnams kyang 'dus la /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:459a-5: dge ba'i chos thams cad kyang sgrub pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:459a-6: chos thams cad yang dag par sdud pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:459a-8: gzhan yang khyod kyis byams pa'i lus kyi las dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:459a-9: byams pa'i ngag gi las dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:459a-10: byams pa'i yid kyi las kyis nga la bsnyen bkur byas te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:459a-11: de'i phyir da ltar nga 'tsho zhing sdod pa'i lus 'di la khyod kyis dga' ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:459a-14: nga 'das pa'i 'og tu'ang khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la dga' ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:459a-18: nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu khyod kyis ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid chud za bar mi 'gyur ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:459a-19: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu ci nas kyang yi ge gcig kyang nub par mi 'gyur ba de ltar lan gnyis /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:459a-20: lan gsum du khyod kyi lag tu gtad do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:459a-22: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ji srid du 'jig rten na spyod pa de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten na bzhugs par rig par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:459b-0: de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten @459b na sems can rnams la chos ston par rig par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:459b-2: sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:459b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa las chos thos pa dang mi 'bral bar rig par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:459b-4: de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i thad na tshangs par spyad pa spyod par rig par bya ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:459b-5: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan par byed /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:459b-6: yi ger 'dri bar byed; yi ger 'drir 'jug par byed /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:459b-13: tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:459b-29: mchod pa'i yo byad rnam pa mang po gzhan dag gis kyang bsti stang du byed par 'gyur /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:459b-34: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:459b-35: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:459b-36: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag ma de dag dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:459b-37: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:459b-38: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:459b-39: tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:460a-2: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:460a-3: tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che chen po dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:460a-4: tshe dang ldan pa k'a tya ya na'i bu chen po dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:460a-5: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:460a-6: dge slong lhag ma de dag dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:460a-7: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:460a-11: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:460a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:460a-13: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:460a-14: mjug sdud kyi le'u zhes bya ste sum cu gsum pa rdzogs so ////
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:460a-15: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:460a-16: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:460a-18: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:460a-19: ye dharm'a he tu pra bha b'a hetunte sh'anta th'a ga to hya ba dat /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-033-001:460a-20: ti sh'anytsa yo ni ro dha ae bam b'a d'i ma h'a shra ma na:////
